    public interface CapabilitiesHandler
    Classes implementing this interface return their capabilities in regards to datasets.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1 $
    Author:
    FracPete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)
    See Also:
    Capabilities
